availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Maddox (Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860. Private in the 2nd Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) from July 13, 1861 to December 7, 1862.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 91. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. 1 (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), 60.
